statements: SELECT * FROM countries;
SELECT name, capital FROM countries;
SELECT id, name, capital FROM countries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM government_officials;
SELECT name, position FROM government_officials;
SELECT id, name, position FROM government_officials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT countries.name, government_officials.name FROM countries INNER JOIN government_officials ON countries.id = government_officials.country_id;
SELECT countries.name, government_officials.position FROM countries INNER JOIN government_officials ON countries.id = government_officials.country_id WHERE countries.id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM countries;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM countries;
SELECT MIN(id) FROM countries;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM countries;
SELECT name FROM countries ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE name LIKE '%land%';
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE capital = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM government_officials WHERE country_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM countries;
SELECT countries.name, COUNT(*) FROM countries INNER JOIN government_officials ON countries.id = government_officials.country_id GROUP BY countries.name;
SELECT AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM countries;
SELECT name, position FROM government_officials WHERE position LIKE '%Minister%' AND country_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM government.ministries;
SELECT id, name FROM government.ministries;
SELECT minister FROM government.ministries;
SELECT * FROM government.agencies;
SELECT id, name FROM government.agencies;
SELECT director FROM government.agencies;
SELECT * FROM government.departments;
SELECT id, name FROM government.departments;
SELECT head FROM government.departments;
SELECT name, minister FROM government.ministries;
SELECT name, director FROM government.agencies;
SELECT name, head FROM government.departments;
SELECT * FROM government.ministries JOIN government.agencies ON government.ministries.id = government.agencies.id;
SELECT * FROM government.ministries JOIN government.departments ON government.ministries.id = government.departments.id;
SELECT * FROM government.agencies JOIN government.departments ON government.agencies.id = government.departments.id;
SELECT government.ministries.name, government.agencies.name FROM government.ministries JOIN government.agencies ON government.ministries.id = government.agencies.id;
SELECT government.ministries.name, government.departments.name FROM government.ministries JOIN government.departments ON government.ministries.id = government.departments.id;
SELECT government.agencies.name, government.departments.name FROM government.agencies JOIN government.departments ON government.agencies.id = government.departments.id;

SELECT government.ministries.name, government.agencies.director, government.departments.head FROM government.ministries JOIN government.agencies ON government.ministries.id = government.agencies.id JOIN government.departments ON government.ministries.id = government.departments.id;

SELECT government.ministries.*, government.agencies.*, government.departments.* FROM government.ministries JOIN government.agencies ON government.ministries.id = government.agencies.id JOIN government.departments ON government.ministries.id = government.departments.id;
SELECT * FROM government.departments;
SELECT name FROM government.employees;
SELECT * FROM government.projects WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT name, amount FROM government.budgets WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM government.employees WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM government.projects WHERE name = 'Project A';
SELECT name FROM government.projects WHERE department_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM government.employees WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM government.budgets WHERE amount > 100000;
SELECT department_id, name FROM government.departments WHERE department_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM government.employees WHERE department_id = 6 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM government.budgets WHERE department_id = 7;
SELECT project_id, name FROM government.projects WHERE department_id = 8;
SELECT * FROM government.employees WHERE employee_id = 9;
SELECT name FROM government.departments WHERE department_id = 10;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) FROM government.employees WHERE department_id = 11;
SELECT MAX(amount) FROM government.budgets WHERE department_id = 12;
SELECT * FROM government.projects WHERE amount < 50000;
SELECT department_id, name FROM government.departments WHERE name = 'Finance';
SELECT department_id, AVG(amount) FROM government.budgets GROUP BY department_id;
